meanings.definition: A person who writes a novel, poem, essay, etc.
meanings.sent1: The authors of the story were a team of talented writers.
meanings.sent2: Many famous authors have written best-selling books.
meanings.sent3: The authors of the mystery novel kept the readers guessing until the very end.
meanings.sent4: In the library of imagination, authors are the architects of new worlds.
meanings.sent5: The authors' words painted vivid pictures in the minds of their readers.

meanings.definition: To be the author of a book or piece of writing.
meanings.sent1: She authors children's books that inspire young minds.
meanings.sent2: He authors articles for a popular magazine every month.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to authors its own adventure by sneaking into the neighbor's yard.
meanings.sent4: With each stroke of the pen, she authors a new chapter in her life.
meanings.sent5: The poet authors verses that touch the hearts of many.
